topics.body:
You know I think I know why conservatives are freaking out so much about gay marriage; cause people are starting to question the legality of morality laws.

They are partially right about the so called "slippery slope", but not to the level that they're so paranoid about because for the longest time the legal justification for a lot of laws was cause "'Murrica! *fade to bald eagle with feathers the color the usa flag and national anthem in background", but now you have to have some serious fucking justification for laws and now for a lot of bullshit laws people are starting to question the legality of them.  If a law doesn't actually have any legal basis or such they run the risk of their legality being questioned and considering that a lot of morality laws never thought of making any justification other than " 'Murrica!" we're talking about a lot of laws.

I guess the moral lesson of this is that the answer to everything isn't " 'Murrica!"; 2+2 does not equal " 'Murrica!", nor does the answer to a lot of questions about the legality of laws.

So yeah the anti-glbt movement is filled with dumbasses.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
